content.title: Intro
content.content:
1993
Preceded by
1993
1994
Year
1995
Followed by
1995

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1994.

content.title: January
content.content:
28 - Actress Ema Horvath is born.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 33 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
1 - Tolkien's Ring is published.
11 - Actor William Conrad dies.

content.title: March
content.content:
23 - Donald Swann, composer of The Road Goes Ever On, dies.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 34 is published.
? - The Tolkien Collector Issue 6 is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
24 - John Wain, Inkling, dies.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 35 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
29 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 1 is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 36 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
20 - The War of the Jewels is published in the UK.
26 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 2 is published.
? - The Lord of the Rings: Volume 1 is released on SNES.

content.title: December
content.content:
6 - The War of the Jewels is published in the US.
29 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 3 is published.
? - Mallorn 31 is published.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995 is released.
? - Leonid Korablev Calendar 1995 is released.
? - Northwestern Middle-earth Map Set is published.
? - HarperCollins, now Tolkien's primary publisher, resets the text of The Lord of the Rings in digital form, introducing many errors.
Years
1991 1992 1993 1994 1995 1996 1997
